pros: Each piece is made from a single piece of wood and is one of a kind
Comes packaged ready for gift giving
cons: At 10 inches, it’s a little small to hold much

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: 1) the wood trim on top is coming off. 2) The product in the photo and what I got was not the same. It holds 2 tomatoes. For the amount of this bowl, thought it would be produced better.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Broken, can't return.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Amazon's customer service wins the day. I had to go through extra steps to process the return, but their chat option for customer service was helpful and the rep helped me process the return quickly. My rating for the bowl remains; my rating for Amazon's customer service is 5 stars. The bowl arrived broken and is unreturnable. There was a chunk of the top missing and when I turned it over the whole top lip fell off. The bigger issue is I tried to return it but returns were NOT accepted. Do not buy. The money is wasted with a bowl I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Virgen

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowl and beautiful craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Nice bowl and beautiful craftsmanship. I tidbit of the bark is missing, but not too much for me to worry about re-ordering. I keep it on my coffee table and plan to add mixed nuts in it during the winter months. Lovely piece. It is a bit on the smaller side, but a unique conversation piece none of the less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly nothing like the pictures. I was fine with the size, although I thought it would be larger. However, the bark texture was completely gone off the one they sent, which made it look like an unfinished sanding project. Ive seen some other reviews where the bowls actually come with bark so I feel like they may just be very inconsistent in their products. I’ve started the return process.
customer_reviews.author: JWeldon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our living room! We are using it for display as opposed to a fruit bowl. It is unique and a neat conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M. Worley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I believe each one will be unique just because of the wood that is available. I truly like it. It has sophistication, charm and simplicity. Will be ideal for about 3 apples and a couple of kiwis.
customer_reviews.author: P Coozie

customer_reviews.title: Georgeous and better than expected 🌼
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly better than described. Beautiful collection piece. Shown here from few angles for a visual of design and quality. Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Clemans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a place to keep my keys/wallet. Makes my usually cluttered entryway table look organized and as an added bonus, it's absolutely beautiful. Expect a slightly different shape than the picture. 10/10, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowl, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl! I was a little worried because you really never know what something handcrafted looks like when buying online. (exactly why I’m helping others by leaving a review) But I must say, it turned out great! And perfect for this time of year! Actually, anytime of the year. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Subtle beauty
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller that I thought, but looks great on my counter filled with fruit. Exactly the natural look I was going for
customer_reviews.author: Andria gongre

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, holds fruit well.
customer_reviews.text: This looks fantastic on our kitchen table. We've been using it for a couple of months now and it holds about 8 pieces of fruit max. Looks great, works well.
customer_reviews.author: andrew crawford

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship on this is absolutely gorgeous. It makes a unique gift for anyone who appreciates the out-of-doors and handmade items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than i thought it would be. The shape is much more round than expected. It appears rectangular in the images. The wood is cut nicely and very smooth. No imperfections. I rate this 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Rose W.

customer_reviews.title: Once is enough...
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 stars. The bark trim was broken in 4 pieces, basically half of the bowl. Used Gorilla glue to reattach the bark but was not able to achieve a factory fit. I guess that's what they make wood putty and sandpaper for, then a coat of poly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: The fruit bowl cake shaped differently than the one in the picture but I still love it
customer_reviews.author: Calee Monroe

customer_reviews.title: An elegant fruit bowl
customer_reviews.text: I love my fruit bowl. I just bought a new kitchen table and I put my bowl in the middle of it and filled it with oranges. I think it's elegant and also an upgrade from the regular bowls. I wanted something different and saw this fruit bowl and said "that's it!" I am in love with it. Thank you so much. I'm a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca ramos

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bathroom as a potpourri dish. Excellent quality and price is great. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sparta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so pretty! Very rustic. Nice and lightweight. I’m using it to hold/display bath bombs in the bathroom, and it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: dandieandie

customer_reviews.title: Broken On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken. Not all the broken pieces were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: gerald Telles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! through it was going to be a bit bigger but so happy I bought more items from this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: The bowl I got was beautiful. Looks really great on my counter for bananas. Unique in looks.
customer_reviews.author: CRAFTER1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is exactly as expected. It's beautiful and is a nice addition to any setting.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unusual Piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece for your dining room table because it’s so unusual. I also like it because it doesn’t damage my fruit. It’s a little smaller than I expected but I still think it’s a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Formallee

customer_reviews.title: Get it .....
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the pictures do NOT do this item justice. This is a beautiful piece and can be a centerpiece in any room. I can’t use it for what I originally bought it for (cologne tray) but I will find somewhere for it to stay. Truly exceptional quality and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Carratala

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful artwork.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a fruit bowl or just a piece of art on a dining table. It’s beautifully crafted.
customer_reviews.author: PBJOANS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl, lots of compliments! Definitely a focal piece. We use it at the entry way table for keys/wallets and everything just fits for the two of us. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Well made and got a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Griffin

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The bowl I received looked nothing like the picture advertised...I ordered this specifically for the length and color of wood...the one I received was about the length of my forearm and the wood was much lighter in color.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Beautiful! Art in wood!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this wooden bowl. It's almost too beautiful to put anything in, I'd rather just show it off as is! It is more beautiful than the photo of it on Amazon. Perfect for gifting or displaying as art.
customer_reviews.author: Joni  Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is beautiful and exactly what I expected if not more! Very pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Karlstrand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Many many compliments...I use it as a entry way bowl to hold the families keys...Very unique!
customer_reviews.author: Shop-a-holic!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fruit basket and it looks fabulous on my new countertop
customer_reviews.author: Estelle T. Stormer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three bowls and they are all perfect. The quality is top of the line and they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Imma Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a fruit bowl and no chips or cracks upon arrival
customer_reviews.author: Greggae512

customer_reviews.title: Unique multi-use bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Very unique bowl, great finish....using it on our coffee table to keep all of our remotes for audio video. Looks great! Fast service and well packed ...👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Pablo F.

customer_reviews.title: product is not like picture
customer_reviews.text: The edges did not have any bark on them. The shape is different from what is pictured. Not a very large bowl.
customer_reviews.author: ann koenig

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Disappointed with shape.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice just not the shape I thought it would be. Looked rectangler in picture but product was square.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W

customer_reviews.title: I love the bowl it is gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Slighty smaller than anticipated but I DONT CARE! I love the bowl it is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought and not as luxurious as the picture
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bowl. It was smaller than anticipated, however, I still love it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry jones

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This item is alot smaller than it appears in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice organic bowl
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be, but a nice bowl for fruit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fiance loved
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what I ordered but however my fiance loved it so I'm satisfied. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: LJohnson

customer_reviews.title: The bowl with pizzazz
customer_reviews.text: This is a statement piece that gives my raw food dishes the presentation to make a good taste buds excited! Very durable and unique. I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Khristina Charley

customer_reviews.title: Definately worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift. Recipient will love it!
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE GURLEY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed all around
customer_reviews.text: This bowl has little weight to it, and the colors are faded and weak - nothing like the photo. I had hoped to use it as a nice fruit bowl, but it's really barely enough for an individual salad bowl. I put it away in the kitchen cupboard. It's not something that you would be proud to display.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Weird Fin
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking bowl, but I'm unclear as to why it has a giant shark fin coming off of it? Doesn't add anything to the bowl, just looks goody ... I may sand it off or down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Cuter in the online photos.
customer_reviews.text: While it's a lot smaller than it looks, it's a cute bowl. I opened the box the same day I received it to unfortunately the rim broken off the side of the item. I've attempted two times to return it without success.
customer_reviews.author: VanB

customer_reviews.title: This bowl looks truly amazing! It is a one of a kind piece
customer_reviews.text: This bowl looks truly amazing! It is a one of a kind piece. The only complaint I have is the packaging of this product. It REALLY needs to be wrapped in bubble wrap as this bowls rim is delicate. When I opened the package two pieces of the bowls rim was broken off. I had to hot glue them back onto the bowl. I feel that some simple bubble wrap INSTEAD of the paper would be a better option. But other then that very happy with this bowl.
customer_reviews.author: pplper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised by how much I liked this! It’s very unique looking and adds an interesting element to your decor. It’s very nice quality and holds a few pieces of fruit (not a ton, but enough for one or two people).
customer_reviews.author: LeelaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dish
customer_reviews.text: The dish is beautiful. I misread the measurements. I knew it was 10” long but didn’t realize it was as wide as it is. I’m not able to use it where I originally intended, but it’s too pretty to return. The seller had the exact measurements so that’s totally my error. This would also make a wonderful gift for anyone that likes wood items.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: 100 % CONVERSATION PIECE
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray. It sits in the center of my coffee table and I put little things in it for looks. It’s beautiful, and it’s bigger than the picture. Everybody who sees this on your table will tell you how cool it is, how neat, how unique!! It’s definitely a conversation piece!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Country Folks! This is for us.
customer_reviews.text: The product only holds a small amount of fruit but that’s okay too. I love it and I’m very happy with this product. It’s beautiful and I love the shape. I’m ordering another one as we speak! It’s a must have.
customer_reviews.author: ambowiegallegos

customer_reviews.title: not as decribed
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 bowles , i open 1 and the edges wore crumble in. I did not open the 2nd bowle. They are not as described, very small . Not worth the money. Is so small that 2 apples did not fit in.
customer_reviews.author: mariana

customer_reviews.title: I laughed when I opened the box...
customer_reviews.text: This can't even fit a single banana. This is not a fruit basket. don't fall for this like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, size smaller, not like photo
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit deceptive, the photo shown. It's much smaller and the color is not as it is shown in the photo. I like it because it is wooden. I'll use it for a bit and see how the craftsmanship hold up. Too expensive for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This product was packed with two things of propel water in the wood on top was cracked and fell off
customer_reviews.author: JOAN ROSSIE

customer_reviews.title: overall impressed
customer_reviews.text: quality of the item is flawless and beautiful. I however didnt read the measurements and went off of the picture which was my mistake. The item seems to be about half the size of the picture. love it great job and ill still find beautiful use for it.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as the picture and much smaller than you would imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister. It is even more beautiful than the picture! Very high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: M. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Its stunning
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my Game of Thrones party and it was an amazing addition. Plus I can use it now for house decor
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this small fruit bowl for my RV to match our woodsy theme and it’s perfect! Would love to buy another size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bowl as a wedding gift and it did not disappoint; it's beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Trailblazer

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this piece is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used this amazing bowl to display my seaglass collection, it is perfect!.
customer_reviews.author: jenren

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knock off.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. And agree with the other reviews, this is not the same product in the picture. It looked more oblong and longer, this is a very small bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It is beautifully made. I would recommend it to anyone who love natural beauty!
customer_reviews.author: granibear

customer_reviews.title: It's cute
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were a little bigger, but it looks great and it holds a small amount of fruit very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful bowl! It is perfect to hold all our various TV/component remotes and is unique and sturdy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: car

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl! Gave it as a gift and was well received. Multiple compliments every time I have guests see it!
customer_reviews.author: PamS

customer_reviews.title: Completely broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless as it is busted to pieces upon unwrapping it. It was supposed to be a git given tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Vogel

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: It does not look anything as advertised in the ad. Was expecting to look close to the item as in Amazon ad. DISAPPOINTED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Great centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: Great centerpiece. Fits 3 candles and add a few pine cones or flowers great price
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Bulson

customer_reviews.title: Totally love this bowl..
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray so much! Definitely buy one you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice looking bowl.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is fairly small, but it looks great and it feels well made. Can't really argue with the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't look like the photo, looked better. Love it and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture but really didn't thrill me, as I thought it would.

customer_reviews.title: This bowl id beautiful and I love it
customer_reviews.text: This bowl id beautiful and I love it. I am so glad to have found it on here! Well made and provides a beautiful presentation for your food.
customer_reviews.author: Marika Riggs

product_meta.title: roro 10 In Mango Wood Fruit Bowl with Bark Edges Made from Sustainable Orchard Wood
feature_bullets: 100% hand-crafted and carved from a single piece of wood
Great for salads, candy, and fruit and has a food safe finish
Comes packaged to be gift friendly
